Package arc.discord

Class DiscordRPC

java.lang.Object
arc.discord.DiscordRPC
public final class DiscordRPC extends Object
Simple class for handling Discord Rich Presence. Implementation based on https://github.com/jagrosh/DiscordIPC This the only know implementation that is pure Java; on Linux/Mac, this uses Java 16's new Unix sockets.
